core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Receptive, yielding, and devoted like the Earth. Success comes through constancy, correctness, and following right guidance rather than forcing leadership. Proper alignment brings support and good fortune.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Receptive power that nourishes and sustains. True strength here is steady, responsive, loyal to what is natural, not ego-driven initiative.

translations.text: He treads on hoarfrost; the strong ice will come by and by.
履霜，堅冰至 (Lǚ shuāng, jiān bīng zhì)

lines.normalized_meaning: Small early signs indicate what’s coming. Subtle instability now will harden into something serious if ignored.

translations.text: Straight, square, and great. Without deliberate effort or practice, yet nothing is not favorable.
直方大，不習无不利 (Zhí fāng dà, bù xí wú bù lì)

lines.normalized_meaning: Pure receptivity has integrity, honesty, and breadth. It doesn’t posture. Because it’s aligned, everything benefits.

translations.text: Her (its) excellence is contained and not displayed; this may be maintained with correctness. If engaged in the service of the ruler, seek no recognition for achievements, but bring matters to completion.
含章可貞。或從王事，无成有終 (Hán zhāng kě zhēn. Huò cóng wáng shì, wú chéng yǒu zhōng)

lines.normalized_meaning: Keep your brilliance quiet and steady. Serve well, finish what needs finishing, don’t chase credit.

translations.text: A tied-up sack. No blame, no praise.
括囊，无咎无譽 (Guā náng, wú jiù wú yù)

lines.normalized_meaning: Hold your position. Stay sealed, neutral, and quiet. Strategic non-disclosure is correct here.

translations.text: A yellow lower garment. Supreme good fortune.
黃裳元吉 (Huáng cháng yuán jí)

lines.normalized_meaning: Modesty and grounded dignity bring real blessing. Power expressed with humility is auspicious.

translations.text: Dragons fight in the open country. Their blood is black and yellow.
龍戰于野，其血玄黃 (Lóng zhàn yú yě, qí xuè xuán huáng)

lines.normalized_meaning: When receptive force tries to dominate like initiating force, roles invert and chaos erupts. Massive conflict, avoid this state.
